00021 #include "FileUtils.h"
00022 #include <sys/stat.h>
00023 #include <sys/types.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00026 #include <windows.h>
00027 #else
00028 #include <dirent.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00034 static string LockFileExtension = ".lock";
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Check the existance of the file.
00038  */
00039 bool FileUtils::Exists(const char *fileName)
00040 {
00041         struct stat st;
00042         return (stat(fileName, &st) == 0);
00043 }
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Delete the input file.
00047  */
00048 bool FileUtils::RemoveFile(const char *fileName)
00049 {
00050         return (remove(fileName) == 0);
00051 }
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Check if either the file or the lock file exists.
00055  * Return false the file does not exist of if the lock file does exist.
00056  * Otherwise create the lock file and return the status of the creation.
00057  */
00058 bool FileUtils::LockFile(const char *fileName)
00059 {
00060         if (FileUtils::Exists(fileName) == false)
00061                 return false;
00062 
00063         string lockFile = fileName + LockFileExtension;
00064         if (FileUtils::Exists(lockFile.c_str()) == true)
00065                 return false;
00066 
00067         ofstream fileStream;
00068         fileStream.open(lockFile.c_str(), ios::out);
00069         bool isOpen = fileStream.is_open();
00070         fileStream.close();
00071         return isOpen;
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*
00075  * If the lock file does not exist then return a false.
00076  * Otherwise remove the lock file and return the status.
00077  */
00078 bool FileUtils::UnlockFile(const char *fileName)
00079 {
00080         string lockFile = fileName + LockFileExtension;
00081         if (FileUtils::Exists(lockFile.c_str()) == false)
00082                 return true;
00083         return (remove(lockFile.c_str()) == 0);
00084 }
00085 
00086 list<string> FileUtils::ListFiles(const char *pathName, const char *ext)
00087 {
00088         list<string> files;
00089         string basePath = pathName;
00090         if (basePath.length() > 0)
00091         {
00092                 if (basePath[basePath.length()-1] != '\\' && basePath[basePath.length()-1] != '/')
00093                 {
00094                         basePath += "/";
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         string exten = ext;
00098 
00099 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00100 
00101         WIN32_FIND_DATA findData;
00102         string search = basePath + "*.";
00103         if (exten.length() == 0)
00104                 search += "*";
00105         else
00106                 search += exten;
00107         HANDLE hHandle = FindFirstFile(search.c_str(), &findData);
00108         BOOL bFound = (hHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
00109         while (bFound)
00110         {
00111                 if (!(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY))
00112                 {
00113                         string file = basePath + findData.cFileName;
00114                         files.push_back(file);
00115                 }
00116 
00117                 // Find the next file.
00118                 bFound = ::FindNextFile(hHandle, &findData);
00119         }
00120         ::FindClose(hHandle);
00121 
00122 #else
00123 
00124         struct stat st;
00125         DIR *dirp = opendir(pathName);
00126         struct dirent *dp;
00127         bool cont = (dirp != NULL);
00128         while (cont)
00129         {
00130                 dp = readdir(dirp);
00131                 if (dp)
00132                 {
00133                         string file = basePath + dp->d_name;
00134                         stat(file.c_str(), &st);
00135                         if ((st.st_mode & S_IFDIR) != S_IFDIR)
00136                         {
00137                                 if (exten.length() == 0)
00138                                 {
00139                                         files.push_back(file);
00140                                 }
00141                                 else
00142                                 {
00143                                         if (file.rfind(ext) == file.length()-exten.length())
00144                                         {
00145                                                 files.push_back(file);
00146                                         }
00147                                 }
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150                 cont = (dp != NULL && dirp != NULL);
00151         }
00152         if (dirp)
00153                 closedir(dirp);
00154 
00155 #endif
00156 
00157         return files;
00158 }
